name: Inauguration of the Chapter
description: The inauguration of the ANVAYA NIE IUCEE Student Chapter marks the start of a transformative journey, empowering students to lead impactful, real-world projects through innovation, collaboration, and ethical engineering.

name: First Event
description: The event featured insightful talks by two esteemed guestsâ€”one highlighting the journey of entrepreneurship and the other exploring the exciting vision behind Cosmic Ride. Their experiences inspired students to think beyond the classroom and embrace innovation with purpose.
